Lack of public secondary school in Mangawhai a ‘growing problem’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/lack-of-public-secondary-school-in-mangawhai-a-forming-problem/YWGO3ATXTNBNHKTQY6UCLGWWWQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/lack-of-public-secondary-school-in-mangawhai-a-forming-problem/YWGO3ATXTNBNHKTQY6UCLGWWWQ/ Brodie StoneA private school will open in February, but residents wonder where the public option is.
